Privacy Policy

Your privacy is important to us. When you sign up, we collect personal information such as your name and email address. This information is used solely to provide you with our services and to communicate with you regarding your account. We do not share your information with third parties without your consent, except as required by law. By signing up, you agree to our privacy practices. You can review our full privacy policy on our website for more details.
